entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms and hail early this evening. 40 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:01 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. 40 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:01 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
